# BGTask

**Class**

An abstract class for the framework’s tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
class BGTask
```

## Overview

With the exception of [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTask], which your app executes in the foreground, the system executes [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGTask] subclasses on behalf of your app, while your app is in the background.

## Reading Task Information

- **identifier**: The string identifier of the task.

## Configuring a Task

- **expirationHandler**: A handler called shortly before the task’s background time expires.
- **setTaskCompleted(success:)**: Informs the background task scheduler that the task is complete.

## Essentials

- **Background Tasks updates**: Learn about important changes in Background Tasks.
- **BGTaskScheduler**: A class for scheduling tasks that add background support to your app’s most critical work.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- BGAppRefreshTask
- BGContinuedProcessingTask
- BGProcessingTask

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
